name: Shane Walsh
info:
• 简体中文名: 肖恩·沃尔什
  • 性别: 男
  • 引用来源: http://walkingdead.wikia.com/wiki/Shane_Walsh_(TV_Series)
  • 演员: Jon Bernthal
detail: Shane was Rick Grimes's partner in the King County Sheriff's Department and best friend since high school. When the apocalypse occurred (with Rick in a coma) Shane helped save Lori Grimes and Carl Grimes by fleeing with them toward Atlanta.
